definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="canBeat" type="Boolean">canBeat</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_ticks</field></block><block type="controls_if" x="213" y="124"><comment h="68" pinned="false" w="294">This example will test if the current entity type is the player. If it is true, then it will run whatever you place in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:BasaltGuardian</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">BasaltGuardianEntity entityB = (BasaltGuardianEntity) entity;</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">entityB.isAttacking</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">yes</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">no</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block><block type="world_send_chat" x="417" y="357"><value name="text"><block type="text_format_number"><value name="number"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">entityB.jumpTicks</field></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##.##</field></block></value></block></value></block><block type="world_send_chat" x="8" y="433"><value name="text"><block type="text_format_number"><value name="number"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##.##</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_isinvisible"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">true</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">false</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
